replies.body: F8 got all the details spot on! In order to get the flair to pop up, you need to get those honors from either 2 premade teammates or 1 stranger after a match. That will give you the flair in the very next match, and you do need to earn it again each time.

> [{quoted}](name=R13er,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=17a9Xw5A,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-31T08:29:01.373+0000)

"At level 3 and above, honors from two premade teammates unlock loading screen flair in your next game."

"At level 3 and above, an honor from a non-premade teammate unlocks loading screen flair in your next game."

Source: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor

Hope it helps
